twoSetSkill.name: Blessed Blade 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Shortens debuffs duration by 50%. Mei, Yae Sakura, or Himeko equip bonus: Gain 20% Max HP in battle.

threeSetSkill.name: Energy Focus 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Charges once every 5s. For the next Basic, Combo, or Charged ATK and a short period after that 80% Physical DMG and 50% Crit Rate.
